ab.rub: This is the true measure of the caliber, but the bore always scrapes a bit more off.

div.head: Petard
div.ab: They are better when shaped as the crucible with a narrow bottom and a larger muzzle. You have to strongly tamp the powder & add either some small gravel or some cork or even better a well-fitted wax plate for it seals well and makes more pressure. The ball just makes a hole, the powder only gives greater effect. One believes that being loaded fifteen days earlier & kept in a dry place for fifteen days, they have greater force.
